questions.question: Considering the overall rectangular shape and the detailed nutritional information presented, what is the primary function of this item?

Based on the visible text, what is the stated serving size of the food product this label describes?
What is the dominant textual element providing the most prominent information on this food item's label?
What is the numerical value indicated for the total calories per serving shown most prominently?
Examining the text blocks, what unit of measurement is consistently used for the amounts of various nutrients?
Looking at the data presented, which nutrient has the highest percentage of the daily value?
What is the specified quantity of saturated fat (in grams) per serving as listed on this label?
